00030 int Filesystem::decode_response_open(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00031   uint8_t *msg = event_ptr->message;
00032   size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen;
00033   int error, fd;
00034 
00035   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00036     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00037 
00038   if (error != Error::OK)
00039     throw Exception(error);
00040 
00041   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&fd))
00042     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00043 
00044   return fd;
00045 }

00050 int Filesystem::decode_response_create(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00051   return decode_response_open(event_ptr);
00052 }

00057 size_t
00058 Filesystem::decode_response_read(EventPtr &event_ptr, void *dst, size_t len) {
00059   uint8_t *msg = event_ptr->message;
00060   size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen;
00061   uint64_t offset;
00062   int error;
00063   uint32_t nread;
00064 
00065   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00066     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00067 
00068   if (error != Error::OK)
00069     throw Exception(error);
00070 
00071   if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msg, &remaining, &offset))
00072     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00073 
00074   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, &nread))
00075     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00076 
00077   if (remaining < nread || len < nread)
00078     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00079 
00080   // PERF: We could just send back a pointer to msg here
00081   memcpy(dst, msg, nread);
00082 
00083   return nread;
00084 }

00089 size_t
00090 Filesystem::decode_response_read_header(EventPtr &event_ptr, uint64_t *offsetp,
00091                                         uint8_t **dstp) {
00092   uint8_t *msg = event_ptr->message;
00093   size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen;
00094   int error;
00095   uint32_t amount;
00096 
00097   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00098     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00099 
00100   if (error != Error::OK)
00101     throw Exception(error);
00102 
00103   if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msg, &remaining, offsetp))
00104     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00105 
00106   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, &amount))
00107     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00108 
00109   if (dstp)
00110     *dstp = msg;
00111 
00112   return amount;
00113 }

00118 size_t
00119 Filesystem::decode_response_pread(EventPtr &event_ptr, void *dst, size_t len) {
00120   return decode_response_read(event_ptr, dst, len);
00121 }

00126 size_t
00127 Filesystem::decode_response_append(EventPtr &event_ptr, uint64_t *offsetp) {
00128   uint8_t *msg = event_ptr->message;
00129   size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen;
00130   int error;
00131   uint32_t amount;
00132 
00133   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00134     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00135 
00136   if (error != Error::OK)
00137     throw Exception(error);
00138 
00139   if (!Serialization::decode_long(&msg, &remaining, offsetp))
00140     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00141 
00142   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, &amount))
00143     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00144 
00145   return amount;
00146 }

00173 void
00174 Filesystem::decode_response_readdir(EventPtr &event_ptr,
00175                                     std::vector<String> &listing) {
00176   uint8_t *msg = event_ptr->message;
00177   size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen;
00178   int error;
00179   uint32_t len;
00180   const char *str;
00181 
00182   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00183     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00184 
00185   if (error != Error::OK)
00186     throw Exception(error);
00187 
00188   listing.clear();
00189   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, &len))
00190     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00191 
00192   for (uint32_t i=0; i<len; i++) {
00193     if (!Serialization::decode_string(&msg, &remaining, &str))
00194       throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00195     listing.push_back(str);
00196   }
00197 }

00202 bool
00203 Filesystem::decode_response_exists(EventPtr &event_ptr) {
00204   uint8_t *msg = event_ptr->message;
00205   size_t remaining = event_ptr->messageLen;
00206   int error;
00207   bool exists;
00208 
00209   if (!Serialization::decode_int(&msg, &remaining, (uint32_t *)&error))
00210     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00211 
00212   if (error != Error::OK)
00213     throw Exception(error);
00214 
00215   if (!Serialization::decode_bool(&msg, &remaining, &exists))
00216     throw Exception(Error::RESPONSE_TRUNCATED);
00217 
00218   return exists;
00219 }
